item.description:
Let's discover a world of art and culture at the Peabody Essex Museum (PEM) in Salem, MA. We will explore the museum and visit the Yin Yu Tang's house.

For a limited time there is a special exhibit called "Mahjong: Contemporary Chinese Art" from the Sigg Collection.

We will meet in front of the PEM to go to lunch first so we can get energy to tour the museum. Please "be on time"!


Admission to the Museum is $15 and additional $5 to the Chinese house. With a group rate we should be able to get in for $12/person. However, this group rate does not include the Yin Yu Tang house.

Transportation - is your own responsibility. However, if you need a ride - please mention that in your rsvp where you are coming from and what T stop you are closest to. A member may be able to give you a ride. And if you can provide a carpool, please notate which city you are coming from. We will do our best to arrange carpools or members can contact each other via email to arrange carpools.

PEM is also accessible by commuter rail. see link for more info and where to find municipal parking.

http://www.pem.org/vi...


For more info on the museum: http://pem.org/museum...
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet infront of the Museum

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Day at the Peabody Museum
